com.kstechnologies.nirscannanolibrary

Class KSTNanoSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kstechnologies.nirscannanolibrary.KSTNanoSDK

  • public class KSTNanoSDK
extends java.lang.Object
    SDK for interacting with a NIRScan Nano. This SDK is intended to serve as a starting point for creating custom Android applications. This SDK requires a service that acts as the interface between the SDK and the Nano itself. This app uses the BLE Service. The service will act as the Bluetooth communication layer, while the SDK will act as the control layer. Commands are send from app to user using the functions in this class. Since the service handles enumeration, it is important that the GATT operation return codes are checked to see if a characteristic is null when issuing a command. This SDK also contains the JNI functions and custom classes for interfacing with TI's Spectrum C Library. This library is written in C, and requires the NDK to compile. The native functions in this file must match the JNI signature defined in the interface.c file. Along with a correct JNI signature, the classes used to return JNI objects must match the class hierarchy in order to be properly used by the NDK

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  KSTNanoSDK.NanoDevice
      Custom class for holding Nano device objects These objects are created when the calling activity scans for Nano BLE devices Created by collinmast on 3/21/16.
      static class  KSTNanoSDK.NanoGATT
      Collection of UUIDs for all of the GATT characteristics available on the Nano.
      static class  KSTNanoSDK.NanoGattCharacteristic
      Collection of BluetoothGattCharacteristics that need to be set upon enumeration.
      static class  KSTNanoSDK.ReferenceCalibration
      Custom class for Reference calibration objects.
      static class  KSTNanoSDK.ScanConfiguration
      Custom class for scan configurations.
      static class  KSTNanoSDK.ScanListManager
      Class to hold the information about the dictionary items in the information view
      static class  KSTNanoSDK.ScanResults
      Custom class for Nano scan results Scan result objects contain wavelength and intensity information WARNING: This class is used by the Spectrum C library and must not change names or move from the current directory

      • dlpSpecScanReadConfiguration

        public static java.lang.Object dlpSpecScanReadConfiguration(byte[] data)

      • KSTNanoSDK_dlpSpecScanInterpReference

        public static KSTNanoSDK.ScanResults KSTNanoSDK_dlpSpecScanInterpReference(byte[] data,
                                                                           byte[] coeff,
                                                                           byte[] matrix)
        Convert serialized scan data to a KSTNanoSDK.ScanResults object. This is a JNI function that accesses the Spectrum C library through the NDK
        Parameters:
        data - Serialized scan data
        coeff - Serialized reference calibration coefficients
        matrix - Serialized reference calibration matrix
        Returns:
        A ScanResults object interpreted from the scan data and reference calibration data

      • KSTNanoSDK_dlpSpecScanReadConfiguration

        public static KSTNanoSDK.ScanConfiguration KSTNanoSDK_dlpSpecScanReadConfiguration(byte[] data)
        Convert a serialized scan configuration to a KSTNanoSDK.ScanConfiguration object. This is a JNI function that accesses the Spectrum C library through the NDK
        Parameters:
        data - the serialized data to interpret
        Returns:
        a ScanConfiguration object parsed from the serialized data

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()

      • enumerateServices

        public static boolean enumerateServices(BluetoothGatt gatt)
        Function to loop through all of the services and characteristics for a specified GATT profile. All of characteristics must be enumerated to return success
        Parameters:
        gatt - The bluetooth gatt to enumerate services and characteristics from
        Returns:
        boolean indicating success

      • setStub

        public static void setStub(byte[] data)
        Set the scan stub name
        Parameters:
        data - the stub name as a byte array

      • startScan

        public static void startScan(byte[] saveToSD)
        Start a new scan
        Parameters:
        saveToSD - single byte indicating whether or not to save to the SD card. Save to SD: 0x01 Don't save to SD: 0x00

      • setTime

        public static void setTime()
        Set the current time on the Nano. This needs to be done every time a connection is made. The date is a seven byte value: Byte 0: year Byte 1: Month Byte 2: Day of the month Byte 3: Day of the week Byte 4: Hour of the day Byte 5: Minute of the hour Byte 6: Second of the Minute

      • setTemperatureThreshold

        public static void setTemperatureThreshold(byte[] threshold)
        Set the temperature threshold of the Nano
        Parameters:
        threshold - two-bye temperature threshold to write

      • setHumidityThreshold

        public static void setHumidityThreshold(byte[] threshold)
        Set the humidity threshold of the Nano
        Parameters:
        threshold - two-byte humidity threshold to write

      • setActiveConf

        public static void setActiveConf(byte[] index)
        Set the active scan configuration by index
        Parameters:
        index - the four-byte index of the scan configuration to set as active

      • getActiveConf

        public static void getActiveConf()
        Read the index of the active scan configuration. This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharGSCISActiveScanConf characteristic.

      • deleteScan

        public static void deleteScan(byte[] index)
        Delete a scan stored on the SD card, specified by a given index
        Parameters:
        index - the four-byte stored scan index to delete

      • getModelNumber

        public static void getModelNumber()
        Read the Model Number reported by the Nano. This value is reported as a byte array that needs to be converted into a string This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharDISModelNumber characteristic.

      • getSerialNumber

        public static void getSerialNumber()
        Read the Serial Number reported by the Nano. This value is reported as a byte array that needs to be converted into a string This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharDISSerialNumber characteristic.

      • getHardwareRev

        public static void getHardwareRev()
        Read the hardware revision reported by the Nano. This value is reported as a byte array that needs to be converted into a string This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharDISHardwareRev characteristic.

      • getFirmwareRev

        public static void getFirmwareRev()
        Read the Tiva firmware revision reported by the Nano. This value is reported as a byte array that needs to be converted into a string This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharDISTivaFirmwareRev characteristic.

      • getSpectrumCRev

        public static void getSpectrumCRev()
        Read the Spectrum C library revision reported by the Nano. This value is reported as a byte array that needs to be converted into a string This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharDISSpectrumCRev characteristic.

      • getTemp

        public static void getTemp()
        Read the temperature value reported by the Nano. This value is reported as two bytes. To get the temperature in degrees C, divide by 100 This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharGGISTempMeasurement characteristic.

      • getHumidity

        public static void getHumidity()
        Read the humidity value reported by the Nano. This value is reported as two bytes. To get the humidity in RH%, divide by 100 This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharGGISHumidMeasurement characteristic.

      • getManufacturerName

        public static void getManufacturerName()
        Read the manufacturer name of the Nano. This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharDISManufName characteristic.

      • getBatteryLevel

        public static void getBatteryLevel()
        Read the battery level of the Nano. This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharBASBattLevel characteristic. If no battery is connected to the Nano, a value of 0% is reported

      • getNumberStoredConfigurations

        public static void getNumberStoredConfigurations()
        Read the number of scan configurations stored on the Nano. This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharGSCISNumberStoredConf characteristic.

      • getNumberStoredScans

        public static void getNumberStoredScans()
        Read the number of scans stored on the SD card of the Nano. This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharGSDISNumberSDStoredScans characteristic.

      • getDeviceStatus

        public static void getDeviceStatus()
        Read the device status of the Nano. This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharGGISDevStatus characteristic.

      • getErrorStatus

        public static void getErrorStatus()
        Read the error status of the Nano. This function starts the read process. The data is obtained from the onCharacteristicRead function in BLE Service for the mBleGattCharGGISErrorStatus characteristic.

      • requestStoredConfigurationList

        public static void requestStoredConfigurationList()
        Send request to Nano to retrieve the stored scan configuration list. A value of 0x00 is always written to start the request. The data is sent back as a notification on the characteristic KSTNanoSDK.NanoGattCharacteristic.mBleGattCharGSCISRetStoredConfList.

      • requestScanName

        public static void requestScanName(byte[] index)
        Request scan name from the Nano for a particular scan index. The data is sent back as a notification on the characteristic KSTNanoSDK.NanoGattCharacteristic.mBleGattCharGSDISRetScanName
        Parameters:
        index - the four-byte scan index to retrieve the data for.

      • requestScanConfiguration

        public static void requestScanConfiguration(byte[] index)
        Request scan configuration from the Nano for a particular scan index. The data is sent back as a notification on the characteristic KSTNanoSDK.NanoGattCharacteristic.mBleGattCharGSCISRetScanConfData
        Parameters:
        index - the four-byte scan index to retrieve the data for.

      • requestRefCalCoefficients

        public static void requestRefCalCoefficients()
        Send request to Nano to retrieve the stored reference calibration coefficients A value of 0x00 is always written to start the request. The data is sent back as a notification on the characteristic KSTNanoSDK.NanoGattCharacteristic.mBleGattCharGCISRetRefCalCoefficients.

      • requestRefCalMatrix

        public static void requestRefCalMatrix()
        Send request to Nano to retrieve the stored reference calibration matrix A value of 0x00 is always written to start the request. The data is sent back as a notification on the characteristic KSTNanoSDK.NanoGattCharacteristic.mBleGattCharGCISRetRefCalMatrix.

      • requestScanIndicesList

        public static void requestScanIndicesList()
        Send request to Nano to retrieve the scan indices. A value of 0x00 is always written to start the request. The data is sent back as a notification on the characteristic KSTNanoSDK.NanoGattCharacteristic.mBleGattCharGSDISSDStoredScanIndicesListData.

      • requestScanDate

        public static void requestScanDate(byte[] scanIndex)
        Send request to Nano for the scan date of a particular scan index.
        Parameters:
        scanIndex - the four-byte index of the scan data to be retrieved.

      • requestScanType

        public static void requestScanType(byte[] scanIndex)
        Send request to Nano for the scan type of a particular scan index.
        Parameters:
        scanIndex - the four-byte index of the scan data to be retrieved.

      • requestPacketFormatVersion

        public static void requestPacketFormatVersion(byte[] scanIndex)
        Send request to Nano for the packet format version of a particular scan index.
        Parameters:
        scanIndex - the four-byte index of the scan data to be retrieved.

      • requestSerializedScanDataStruct

        public static void requestSerializedScanDataStruct(byte[] scanIndex)
        Send request to Nano for the serialized scan data structure for a particular scan index.
        Parameters:
        scanIndex - the four-byte index of the scan data to be retrieved.

      • writeCharacteristic

        public static void writeCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                       byte[] data)
        Request a write on a given BluetoothGattCharacteristic.
        Parameters:
        characteristic - The characteristic to write to.
        data - The data to be written.

      • readCharacteristic

        public static void readCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        Request a read on a given BluetoothGattCharacteristic. The read result is reported asynchronously through the BluetoothGattCallback#onCharacteristicRead(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int) callback.
        Parameters:
        characteristic - The characteristic to read from.
